message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
